text: walmtlqat dhwat alhyd, yjb 'an yntzrn dun nkah baed altalaq mudat thlatht athar 'aw thlath hydat ealaa sabil aledt; lytakdn min faragh alrahim min alhml. wala yajuz lahuna tzwj rajul akhar fi 'athna' hadhih aleidat hataa tnthy. wala yahilu lahuna 'an yukhfin ma khalaq allah fi 'arhamihina min alhml 'aw alhyd, 'iin kanat almtlqat muwminat hqana biallah walyawm alakhr. wa'azwaj almtlqat 'ahaqu bmrajethn fi aled. wayanbaghy 'ana yakun dhalik biqasd al'iislah walkhyr, walays biqasd al'iidrar tedhybana lahuna bttwyl aled. walilnisa' huquq ealaa alazwaj, mithl alty elyhn, ealaa alwajh almerwf, walilrijal ealaa alnisa' mnzlt zaydt min hasan alshbt waleshrt bialmaeruf walqiwamt ealaa albayt wamilk altlaq. wallah eaziz lah aleizat alqahrt, hakim yadae kl shay' fi mwdeh almnasb
